document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">An </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">antiquated </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">Grace </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Becomes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">cherished </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Face </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">well </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">prime </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Enjoining </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">us </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">part </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">We </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">our </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">plotting </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">Heart </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">Good </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">friends </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">time </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: An antiquated grace
